rows.label: tev001595_MSG0001
rows.name: Welcome to House Effinger, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001595_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001595_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask the Murderess if she bought this house.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001595_JNK0020
rows.name: Snicker[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001595_SEL0021
rows.name: Laugh at the Murderess's joke.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001595_MSG0007
rows.name:
It wasn't an easy thing for a BLADE to afford,
but I did what I could.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001595_MSG0008
rows.name:
After all, how can I revive House Effinger without a
HOUSE? Even a small one will do for starters.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001595_MSG0010
rows.name: ...I wasn't joking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001595_MSG0011
rows.name:
I used all the money I've saved up doing BLADE work
to buy this humble abode.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001595_MSG0012
rows.name:
After all, how can I revive House Effinger without a
HOUSE? Even a small one will do for starters.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001595_MSG0014
rows.name:
It wasn't easy to get this place, let me tell you.
It required the assistance of many people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001595_MSG0015
rows.name:
Do you remember that day when you forced your
way into an important business meeting of mine?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001595_MSG0016
rows.name:
The man with whom I was negotiating had some trust
issues with little old me. But once he saw the famous
[ST:playername ], he changed his tune.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001595_MSG0017
rows.name: He was even willing to sell me this house.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001595_MSG0018
rows.name:
The next hurdle was applying to BLADE command for
permission to complete the purchase.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001595_MSG0019
rows.name:
Looking at the rules, I was in a less-than-favorable
situation. They were about to deny me, actually.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001595_MSG0020
rows.name: But then ol' Grandpa 'Stache decided to weigh in.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001595_MSG0021
rows.name:
He said, "Hey, if it gets that psychopath out of the
administrative district, I'm all for it. Ga ha ha!"
And then they approved my request.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001595_MSG0022
rows.name: That man infuriates me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001595_MSG0023
rows.name:
Regardless, he has my gratitude. Thanks to him,
I've taken the first step to my family's resurgence.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001595_MSG0024
rows.name:
It'll grow from this to a bigger house to a mansion.
And then I'll buy the entirety of Ishmael Hills,
bulldoze it, and build an appropriately splendid estate![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001595_JNK0030
rows.name: Assist[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001595_SEL0031
rows.name: Offer to help the Murderess in any way that you can.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001595_JNK0040
rows.name: Propose[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001595_SEL0041
rows.name: Offer to invest in the house and live with the Murderess.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001595_MSG0030
rows.name:
Well, aren't you sweet? But you've already helped me
come this far.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001595_MSG0031
rows.name:
My plans are merely dreams at this point, but with
your assistance, I'm confident that I can make them
come true.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001595_MSG0032
rows.name: I'm counting on you, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001595_MSG0035
rows.name: Iiiinteresting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001595_MSG0036
rows.name:
If I knew you'd actually assist me in my goals,
I'd welcome the company. But I'm not entirely
convinced of your...good intentions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001595_MSG0037
rows.name:
For now, let's just keep working together on BLADE
missions, okay?[ST:wait ]
